full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BCOS LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I SNYING PO LAS SEMS TZAM SKOR GYI MCHAN 'GREL RTZOM 'PHRO RNAM RIG GZHUNG BRGYA'I SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @115B CES MGON PO KLU SGRUB KYIS NGO BO NYID MED PA'I TSUL DANG, BDAG NYID CHEN PO THOGS MED KYIS RNAM PAR RIG PA TZAM GYI TSUL GYI SHING RTA CHEN PO'I SROL GNYIS PHYE NAS, GSUNG RAB KYI DRANG BA DANG NGES PA'I DON RNAM PAR PHYE BA GSAL BAR BYED PA LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA @116A *, ,BA 'DI NI, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG MANG DU THOS PA RIGS PA SMRA BA SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SBYONG SDOM BRTZON BSOD NAMS BLO GROS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm,,SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL,, ,,DRANG NGES SNA TSOGS GSUNGS PA'I RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB GLU, ,GSAL GSAL 'GREL BYED LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO TAMPU RA, ,SHING RTA CHEN PO'I GZHUNG MANG GDANGS SU LEGS BKUG PAS, ,STONG BA RTEN 'BYUNG RTOGS PA'I THABS TSUL 'DI KO RMAD, ,DAD BRTZON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NOR BU DANG, ,BRKO MKHAN DGE SLONG THOGS MED BCAS PA YIS, ,RGYU RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR TE PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DI LAS BYUNG BA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,NAM MKHA'I MTHA' KHYAB DRIN CAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,BDEN GNYIS ZUNG 'BREL BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL, ,THABS SHES ZUNG 'BREL RGYAL MTSAN RTZER MCHOD PAS, SKU GNYIS ZUNG 'BREL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BER SHOG ,CES DAD LDAN BLO BZANG NOR BU NAS LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO PAR BSKRUN SKABS PAR BYANG SMON TSIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR LHA LDAN RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG RDO RJE NAS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
